sentences.sContent: We're going to play football. Do you want to join in?
sentences.sContent_eng: We're going to play football. Do you want to join in?
sentences.sCn: 我们去踢足球， 你来不来?

sentences.sContent: As they often play football together, they have got to know each other quite well.
sentences.sContent_eng: As they often play football together, they have got to know each other quite well.
sentences.sCn: 他们常在一起踢足球，一来二去地也就熟了。
